imgix Promotional & Social Media Creative

This showcase is a serious of various design elements, and collateral produced for imgix from 2013-2016. These include animations, promotions, blog designs, illustrations, and photography.

Changelog

I maintain a lot of the social media for imgix, including assets for the blog and weekly development changelog. Every week, we include a new image that goes out to promote the changelog on various social media outlets including Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Instagram, and our Slack Channel. The images also get used as the OG images for posts.
